mapper.update:
update car_parking_record
car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parking_spaces_id = #{parkingSpacesId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
charge = #{charge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update car_parking_record set car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parking_spaces_id = #{parkingSpacesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, charge = #{charge,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select car_parking_record.* from car_parking_record , parking_spaces where parking_spaces.id = car_parking_record.parking_spaces_id and parking_spaces.status = 1
